about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

The pack includes:

  • Empire rank 17 destroyer Emperor
  • Weapon “Omega-B missile launcher”
  • Unique module “Gyges microwave emitter”

Additionally, the pilot receives:
  • Decor “Blazing star”
  • Pattern “Pink stained glass”
  • Portrait “Empire destroyer commander”

Additionally, the pilot receives the modules:
  • Main caliber
  • Landing platform
  • Wormhole projector
  • Gravitational lens
  • Photon emitter
  • Devastator beam
  • Armor-Plated Hull
  • Reinforced beams
  • Crystal Plates
  • Proton wall

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 90 days!

“Emperor” is the latest destroyer created in the shipyards of the New Empire. Emperor was developed by “Alcor Technology Shipyards”, a large state-owned corporation. The main feature of the destroyer is the support the allied ships by enhancing their weapons, which allows to break through the enemy defenses, and with the right tactics turns “Emperor” into a real fortress. The ship’s newest weapon has no analogues in its class and is a redesigned ADM system, which allows it to efficiently strike small-sized targets.

Currently, the destroyer is being actively introduced into the fleet. Production takes place at the shipyards of Skifia and Alcor. As the Guardian-17 station joins the New Empire, a number of destroyers will be sent to the disputed sectors to fortify imperial positions. Thanks to this reinforcement, the Guardian-17 command plans to clear the sectors of pirates and exert significant pressure on Federation patrol ships.

Recently, a representative of the New Empire contacted UMC command and signed a contract according to which mercenaries will be able to get a new destroyer in their own hands.

“Emperor” is the latest destroyer created in the shipyards of the New Empire. Emperor was developed by “Alcor Technology Shipyards”, a large state-owned corporation. name: Star Conflict - Emperor (Deluxe Edition)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
